snippet: As his federal trial began in Detroit, it remained uncertain what defense Umar Farouk Abdulmutallab, who is representing himself, intends to present.
lead_paragraph: As his federal trial began in Detroit, it remained uncertain what defense Umar Farouk Abdulmutallab, who is representing himself, intends to present.

headline.main: U.S. Says Man Admitted Plot to Blow Up Passenger Jet
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Man Admitted Plot To Blow Up Passenger Jet
headline.seo: Prosecutor Says Nigerian Admitted Trying to Blow Up Plane
